page.title: 10Types of Housing
page.content: around Woodham Comprehensive School *********************************** The houses in the area are made from bricks, and have tiled roofs. Many houses have garages or a drive, but others park on the road or go into a nearby block of garages. Most gardens in the area are of reasonable size and quite a few of them have open front gardens, but some have a surrounding hedge or wall. The houses in Newton Aycliffe range from detached, semi-detached to bungalows and flats, their height ranging from one to four storeys high. The houses are fairly spaced out but not so far that people have to walk long distances. There are many new houses. Newton Aycliffe is a New Town built after the Second World War.
